subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Baseball stole Art Pennington’s future. The Cedar River washed away his past. His house, his car, his clothes, nearly all his photographs, even one of his two dogs — all lost to the Midwest floods.
snippet: Baseball stole Art Pennington’s future. The Cedar River washed away his past. His house, his car, his clothes, nearly all his photographs, even one of his two dogs — all lost to the Midwest floods.
